txt.en:
'You have softened them up, and now they are ready to be defeated. Let us drive these trespassers from Trum Dreng once and for all. This feeble army will think twice before troubling the Stag-clan again!

'What do you say to that?'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'These are troubled times. We are an insignificant village, but I fear that there will be retribution for the snubbing of an emissary....'

'So, you will do it? You are ready to fight off these foes? Our blood may spill, but it will be Dragon-clan that burns and White Hands that are severed!

'Follow me, my friend!'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
Righting the Wrongs of Trum Dreng
Guto is eager to drive the half-orc and Dragon-clan trespassers from Trum Dreng once and for all.
Go with Guto to resolve the dispute in Trum Dreng
Guto is at his encampment, south of the watch-tower.\n\nYou should talk to Guto again when you are ready to begin your assault.
Elder Riagán is in Lhan Tarren, looking very troubled after everything that transpired.\n\nYou should speak with the Elder.
